hopobject.name: buyxM
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.9.2.3) Gecko/20100401 Firefox/3.6.3
hopobject.body:
Come here for the latest availability information and list of distributors to buy a BeagleBoard-xM.

This page is expected to go live some time on Monday morning. We expect to run out of boards quickly on the launch date, so you should expect your boards to be shipped in approximately 6 weeks, depending on availability of the required components.

  • Digi-Key BeagleBoard-xM product purchase page
